SCTX:
begin Float

float  	timer
float	swingTime
float	swingSpeed
float	startAngle

;set startAngle to GetStartingAngle, x

if ( MenuMode == 0 )

	set swingTime to 1
	;set swingSpeed to 30

	set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )

	;rotate up
	if ( timer < swingTime )

		Rotate x,2

	;rotate down

	elseif ( timer < (swingTime * 3) )

			Rotate x, -2

	;up again
	elseif (timer < (swingTime * 4 ) )
		Rotate x, 2

	;reset timer to zero
	else
		set timer to 0
		SetAtStart

	endif

endif

end Float
